Articles.Content:
I believe I saw it mentioned just before/after .90 came out that this coming update would focus on the aerodynamics. I have been a bit out of the loop lately so has anyone seen any other info dropped about the next update?

If it is aerodynamics, that would lead me to believe that we are finally getting stock fairings for the payload! But maybe that is just wishful thinking.
Don't take that thread as proper news. It's just a bunch of speculation by the community.

Don't take that thread as proper news. It's just a bunch of speculation by the community.

Precisely, we like to discuss possibilities but it's certainly not reliable info. We know 2 things for fact:

1. Aerodynamics in the next patch.

2. It's not NEAR or FAR.

That's it.

Please carry on discussion of the new aero model in the thread in Development discussion *Aqua* was kind enough to link.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107082-Stock-Aero-News-from-the-Squadcast
